greeting.text: Well, well. Another courier, eh? Good. I've got cargo that needs tracking and letters that need delivering. You look sturdy enough. What brings you to my docks?

choices.text: I heard you have a daughter. How is she?

offer_work.text: Good! I like someone who's direct. I've got a shipment manifest that needs to reach the Harbor Master by evening. Standard rate - 8 coins. Think you can handle it?

choices.text: Eight coins seems low for urgent work.

passing_through.text: Hmph. Well, if you change your mind and want honest work, you know where to find me. The docks always need reliable couriers.

daughter_topic.text: My Sarah? That's... kind of you to ask. She's been coughing something fierce lately. The healers say she needs rest, but medicine costs money. That's why I work these long hours.

choices.text: I'm sorry to hear that. I hope she gets better soon.

firm_price.text: Eight coins is the going rate, courier. I run a fair operation here. Take it or leave it - plenty of others willing to work for honest pay.

choices.text: Fair enough. I'll take the job.

appreciate_sympathy.text: Thank you. Not many people care about a docker's troubles. Tell you what - if you're looking for work, I'll remember your kindness. Come back anytime.

give_job.text: That's what I like to hear! Here's the manifest. Captain Thorne needs this before the evening tide. Don't let me down.

no_deal.text: Your loss. When you're ready for honest work at honest wages, you know where to find me.
